thread.title: IPL 2017: List of all 351 players registered for auction in 10th edition of the cash-rich league | Zee News
thread.title_full: IPL 2017: List of all 351 players registered for auction in 10th edition of the cash-rich league | Zee News

title: IPL 2017: List of all 351 players registered for auction in 10th edition of the cash-rich league | Zee News
text:
Follow @ZeeNewsSports 
New Delhi: It's that time of the year again when every cricket fan has eyes set on the auction of the cash-rich Indian Premier League as fans anticipate which player is heading to which franchise. 
From an original pool of 799 players, a total of 351 are up for grabs including 226 Indian and 125 oversees. The list includes 122 capped, 223 uncapped and six Associates players but only 76 of these players can be purchased in the auction. 
While Ishant Sharma is the most expensive Indian player with the base price of Rs. 2 crore, most local players have opted for a low base price ranging between Rs. 30 lakh to Rs. 70 lakh. 
Here's the list of players eligible for the 2017 IPL auction:- Sr. No.
